Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 30 Apr 2019Your  incomeshield plan B is your hospitalisation coverage. Why did u think u didnt have any? During the financial counselling of your hospitalisation u should have been advised by the admission staff? =DYou should consider upgrading your hospitalisation plan, either to planP or to the enhanced incomeshield. For you age, a term $400k coverage for life and ci until age65 will only cost u less than $800/yr. What was the exact diagnosis (this nerve condition) u mentioned? It might affect your ability to purchase future insurance. Were u hospitalised in a private or restructured hospital?0 comments0
